ball-clicker.title: Ball Clicker
ball-clicker.description: Experience the mesmerizing world of Ball Clicker

HomeIframe.title: Welcome to Ball Clicker
HomeIframe.description: Get ready to experience the most satisfying ball bouncing game where you spawn vibrant balls inside rotating circles for endless fun!

HomeFeatures.gameTitle: Ball Clicker - A Mesmerizing Clicker Experience
HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Ball Clicker is an incremental clicker game where you spawn vibrant, bouncing balls inside rotating circles. Watch as they transform into dazzling colors and collect valuable rewards as they fall.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Click to generate balls within the rotating circle
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Keep balls bouncing inside to increase their value
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Collect rewards and unlock powerful upgrades
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Experience realistic ball bouncing and collisions within rotating circles
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Watch balls transform into dazzling colors as they bounce and evolve
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Unlock powerful upgrades to enhance your ball collection and earnings
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Master multiple rotating circles and increasing difficulty levels
